name: Append commands user shell profile
description: An adversary may wish to establish persistence by executing malicious commands from the users ~/.profile every time the "user" logs in.

data.command: sed -i "s/# Atomic Red Team was here... T1546.004//" ~/.profile

input_arguments.name: text_to_append
input_arguments.description: Text to append to the ~/.profile file
input_arguments.value: # Atomic Red Team was here... T1546.004
